title: Need 8 RP for skin!
body:
I literally just dumped 50 bucks on this game and am only 8 RP away from getting Star Guardian Jinx skin.

Will Riot fund????

replies.body: Oh man, that's pretty close!  We might be able to work something out here!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or twitter, and we'll get back to you.  See you there!
